name: Outlook Calendar Event File
summary: Learn about .OLK14EVENT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OLK14EVENT files are saved to subdirectories of the following directory in Mac OS X: [user]/​Documents/​Microsoft User Data/​Office 2011 Identities/​Main Identity/​Data Records/​Events/​

description: File created by Microsoft Outlook for Mac, an email and calendar management application; stores data for an event on the Outlook calendar, including the date, time, and invitees; used for saving a local cache of events, even if the calendar is saved remotely.
